title: Shop Small Beverly Hills
desc: If you are a business and would like to be included as one of the stops, please contact Ayami Hiroshige at  . Small Business Saturday is a day dedicated to supporting small businesses across the country. Founded by American Express in 2010, this day is celebrated on the Saturday after Thanksgiving. Shop Small For All this Nov 28, the money they spend in the community can stay in the community. As a consumer, you are a key part in helping small businesses thrive. By shopping or dining at small businesses throughout the year, you're showing your support for the small businesses in your neighborhood and reinvesting in the community you call home.There are lots of ways you can support small business. Please share the word on your social networks. #ShopSmall See the video (Beverly Hills is featured several times):  Visit   for more details.
